name: Conch Quest!
description:
Controls:

WASD movement
R to reset player and boulder position.

Help a lonely crab navigate a cluttered beach, moving a rock into position to make a path.

This is my first game, and it was certainly a learning experience. Couldn't quite figure out how to get the WebGL version running on Itch.IO (though i did manage to get a single very impressive rectangle to show up?), so just throwing up the windows build as I'm out of time to work on the project during the Jam's Window.
